title: svAminAtha paripAlayashu
sahitya:
svAminAtha paripAlayAshu mAm svaprakAsha vallIsha guruguha dEva sEnEsha


caraNam   kAmajanaka bhAratIsha sEvita kArttikEya nAradAdi bhAvita 
vAmadEva pArvatI sukumAra vArijAstra sammOhitAkAra 
kAmitarttha vitaraNa nipuNa caraNa kAvya nATakAlankAra bharaNa 
bhUmi jalagni vAyu gagana kiraNa bOdha rUpa nityAnanda karaNa
